original_text:
“Yet you have not called on me, Jacob,
    you have not wearied yourselves for me, Israel.
korean_text: 그러나 야곱아 너는 나를 부르지 아니하였고 이스라엘아 너는 나를 괴롭게 여겼으며

sentences.original_text: Yet you have not called on me, Jacob
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너는 나를 부르지 않았도다, 야곱아

sentences.original_text: you have not wearied yourselves for me, Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나를 위해 수고하지 않았도다, 이스라엘아
